summary: A calendar entry documenting a scheduled 30-minute phone call between Linda Singer and the DOJ regarding the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The entry is classified as personal and was created in October 2020.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Listed as the attendee for a scheduled phone call with the DOJ about the Epstein investigation.

events.title: DOJ Call on Epstein Investigation
events.description: A scheduled 30-minute phone call between Linda Singer and the Department of Justice regarding the Southern District of New York's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A phone call was scheduled for October 5, 2020, between Linda Singer and the DOJ to discuss the SDNY's Epstein investigation.
The calendar entry is classified as 'X-PERSONAL'.
The entry was created on October 2, 2020, two days before the scheduled call.
